command.start: docker-compose -f network/nuritelecom/exchange-bc-tls/docker-compose.yml up -d;sleep 3s; docker exec -e "CORE_PEER_LOCALMSPID=Org1MSP" -e "CORE_PEER_MSPCONFIGPATH=/etc/hyperledger/msp/users/Admin@org1.example.com/msp" peer0.org1.example.com peer channel create -o orderer.example.com:7050 -c mychannel -f /etc/hyperledger/configtx/channel.tx --tls --cafile /etc/hyperledger/orderer/msp/tlscacerts/tlsca.example.com-cert.pem;docker exec -e "CORE_PEER_LOCALMSPID=Org1MSP" -e "CORE_PEER_MSPCONFIGPATH=/etc/hyperledger/msp/users/Admin@org1.example.com/msp" peer0.org1.example.com peer channel join -b mychannel.block; docker-compose -f kafka-docker/docker-compose-single-broker.yml up -d; sleep 15s; docker build -t txbooster booster/. --no-cache; docker run -it --name txbooster --net exchange-bc-tls_basic -p 8080:8080 -d txbooster;
command.end: docker rm $(docker ps -aq) -f;docker rmi $(docker images dev* -q) -f;docker network rm $(docker network ls -q);docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q) -f;#docker-compose -f network/nuritelecom/exchange-bc-tls/docker-compose.yml down;docker-compose -f kafka-docker/docker-compose-single-broker.yml down;docker rm $(docker ps -aq) -f;docker rmi $(docker images dev* -q)
